Our Story

Founded in 2024, Coffee Haven was born from a passion for quality and community.

We source beans directly from sustainable farms and roast them in-house to bring you the freshest flavors. Our baristas are trained in both classic techniques and innovative brewing methods.

  • Direct trade coffee beans
  • House-made pastries daily
  • Cozy workspace-friendly environment
